scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run set-env && npm run validate-env && next dev
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run set-env && npm run validate-env && jest && playwright test
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run set-env && npm run validate-env && next build
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run set-env && npm run validate-env && next start
scripts.db:generate: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run set-env && npm run validate-env && drizzle-kit generate
scripts.db:push: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run set-env && npm run validate-env && drizzle-kit push
scripts.db:studio: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run set-env && npm run validate-env && drizzle-kit studio
scripts.db:migrate: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run set-env && npm run validate-env && node -r ts-node/register ./src/db/migrate.ts
scripts.db:align: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run set-env && npm run validate-env && node -r ts-node/register ./scripts/align-database.ts
scripts.db:introspect: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run set-env && npm run validate-env && drizzle-kit generate
